title: 'Comfortable and soft'
body: 'The quality of the product is way better than my expectation. Even though it is wool it has a soft texture and it is lightweight which makes it easier to carry around. I purchased at ‚Çπ499 which is really cheap and affordable. I highly recommend buying this product.'

title: 'Very soft and comfy blanket
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''The blanket is very comfortable and soft and while washing it becomes very heavy. Almost triple the size of the weight but once dried out it is back to normal and light. The only con I found out was while sleeping you get so cozy that you will miss important alarms or meetings.'

title: 'Comfy'
body: It's good and comfy. Though this is for winters and not for mild rain chills. The fabric is soft and washable as well.

title: 'Womderful product'
body: 'The product is wonderful. Big enough for 2 people and warm enough for my location.'

title: 'Cheating'
body: It's very bad quality.... Please dont do to any customers...... These type of quality products I will get it in 200rs on road side but those are better compare to your products..... It's very bad experience from MNC...... Please for your profits don't cheat customers

body: 'This blanket is great. It is soft  perfect weight & launders beautifully! I am very pleased with my purchase! In fact plan to order a second one soon.'

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'Loved the blanket as soon as I received it. More than worth the price quoted. Actually thought of ordering 2 for gifting since the description mentioned single blanket. But it is so big  that it can easily be shared by 2 adults. Thick material and quality is very good. Overall must buy'
